column5: Hello Everyone:  If you or someone you know attended the Bridgenorth Winter Panfish Festival on Feb 13, 2010. Check out the photos that have been posted on Clearview Organizing's website.  http://www.clearvieworganizing.com/24.html   We handed out 590 kids prizes and attendance for the free event was estimated at over 1000. A donation of $525.00 was made to the Peterborough United Way on behalf of the festival and it's participates.  Thanks to all, looking forward to next year already.
Great to see all those smiling young faces.
Dang !!!...Now I'm feeling sorry all over again for having to miss the event...(company...grrr)  Great pics Mike...Thanks for posting...

Great Pictures Mike..I think I must have spoke to almost everyone of those kids at some time or other throughout the day. MCI is already on board for next year, glad we could help, I know all our guys had a good time doing it.  Tom.
